TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataFormatDisp

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

Docs.summary: Provides support for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding.DataFormat%2A> property of the interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This interface is used internally by the tools for upgrading Visual Basic 6.0 applications to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
[!INCLUDE[Note_compatibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
